channel.title: edgeos on Dennis Kruyt
channel.description: Recent content in edgeos on Dennis Kruyt

item.title: ZeroTier on a Ubiquiti EdgeRouter (part 2)
item.description: In my previous post I showed how to install ZeroTier on the EdgeRouter, after installing we need to rename the ZeroTier interface to ethx interface to show up in EdgeOS. ZeroTier on a Ubiquiti EdgeRouter With the new EdgeOS version 2 firmware for the EdgeRouter it is now possible to install ZeroTier on this router. Dennis Kruyt Kruyt.org Now I adopted EdgeOS (which is basically VyOS/Vyatta running on the EdgeRouter) to support ZeroTier from the native CLI with tab completion.

item.title: ZeroTier on a Ubiquiti EdgeRouter
item.description: With the new EdgeOS version 2 firmware for the EdgeRouter it is now possible to install ZeroTier on this router.
